roles.title: Indicates the organization that created this content.
Indicates the organization for which this content was created..
Indicates the organization responsible for all content represented in the "document".

parties.name: Customer
parties.remarks: organization to be customized at account creation only for their Component Definition

parties.name: ISV
parties.remarks: organization to be customized at ISV subscription only for their Component Definition
